recipe_name: Scrambled eggs with shaved truffles and chives
author: James Tanner
method: Heat the butter in a small non-stick frying pan. Season the eggs with salt and freshly ground black pepper and pour into the frying pan. With a spatula, push the egg from the outer edges into the centre of the frying pan as it cooks, until all the egg has set. To serve, spoon the egg onto a serving plate, scatter over the truffle and garnish with chives.
ingredients: 15g/½oz butter,  3 free-range eggs, lightly beaten,  salt and freshly ground black pepper ,  ½ tsp chopped truffle (from a jar),  small bunch fresh chives
